alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 02 at 8:32AM EST until January 02 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST /10 AM EST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog with some spots less than 100 feet, especially over the south Chicago suburbs and points south as well as northwest Indiana. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Illinois and northwest Indiana. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST /10 AM EST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Slick spots may be present on roads in northern Illinois where temperatures are around or below freezing, especially on bridges and overpasses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reduced visibility will continue to make travel conditions hazardous for the morning commute. Fog may persist through midday in some places.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
